document_title: Knee pain: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: dau-khop-goi.json_3_What are the symptoms of the disease?
subsection_content:
The location and severity of knee pain can vary, depending on the cause of the condition. Typical symptoms include:
Swelling and stiffness; The painful area is red and warm to the touch; Weak or unstable joints; Hear clicking or crunching sounds in the joints; Inability to fully straighten or bend the knee; In particular, patients should see a doctor immediately if:; Knees are weak and/or unable to bear weight; Marked leg or knee deformities; Fever, accompanied by redness, pain and swelling in the knee; Severe knee pain after injury.
subsection_title: dau khop goi.json. What are the symptoms of the disease?
subsection_data:
